src_original: sahasaiva ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā saddharmapratibādhakaṃ /  dūrato maitram eṣyāmo mā no ruṣyeta eva hi //  rakṣiṣyāmo yathāśaktyā vācākarmasu saṃvṛtāḥ /  sahasainān na vakṣyāmaḥ svapāpe 'smin pratiṣṭhitān //  mṛgabhūtā bhaviṣyāmo 'lpārthā alpakṛtyakāḥ // pe //
tgt_original: 常任我力，善護口過，　　見無用人，　　不說其短。 我住聖種，　　頭陀護戒，　　處定習慧，

src_original: deśayiṣyāmahe dharmaṃ satvā ye dharmatārthikā //  sudūram api yāsyāmo dharmakāmān niśamya ca /  dharmārāmaratiprāptā arthaṃ karttāsma dehinām //
tgt_original: 我為正法，　　極遠當往，為彼說法，　　利益眾故。

src_original: saṃmukhaṃ tatra saṃdṛśya satvānāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu /  ātmaprekṣā bhaviṣyāmo dharmasauratyasaṃsthitāḥ //
tgt_original: 若見凡愚，有缺失者，　　但當自護，　　住法行忍。

src_original: asatkṛtāḥ satkṛtā vā merukalpāḥ prabhūya ca /
tgt_original: 毀辱恭敬，　　當如須彌，　　不染世法，

src_original: annupaliptā lokena bhesyāmo lokanāyakāḥ //
tgt_original: 為世導師。

src_original: katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 何等為五？

src_original: śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam iti //
tgt_original: 信根、進根、念根、定根、慧根。

src_original: tatra katamā śraddhā /
tgt_original: 「云何信根？

src_original: yathā śraddhāyāś caturo dharmān abhiśraddadhāti /
tgt_original: 信於四法。

src_original: katamāṃś caturaḥ /
tgt_original: 何等四？

src_original: saṃsārāvacarīṃ laukikīṃ samyagdṛṣṭiṃ śraddadhāti /  sa karmavipākapratiśaraṇo bhavati /  yad yat karma kariṣyāmi tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmīti /  sa jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
tgt_original: 於生死中行世正見信於業報，乃至失命終不作惡；

src_original: bodhisatvacārikām abhiśraddadhāti /  taccaryāpratipannaś cānyatra yāne spṛhāṃ notpādayati /
tgt_original: 信菩薩行不隨諸見，專求菩提不求餘乘，信解諸法同空無相無願之法；

src_original: paramārthanītārthaṃ gambhīrapratītyasamutpādanairātmyaniḥsatvanirjīvaniḥpudgalavyavahāraśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitalakṣaṇān sarvadharmān śrutvā śraddadhāti /  sarvadṛṣṭikṛtāni ca nānuśete sarvabuddhadharmān balavaiśāradyaprabhṛtīṃś ca śraddadhāti /
tgt_original: 信一切佛十力四無所畏十八不共法。

src_original: śraddhāya ca vigatakathaṃkathas tān buddhadharmān samudānayati /
tgt_original: 如是信已。 消除疑網修集佛法。

src_original: idam ucyate śraddhendriyam //
tgt_original: 是名信根。

src_original: tatra katamad vīryendriyaṃ /
tgt_original: 何等進根？

src_original: yān dharmān śraddhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti tān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayatīdam ucyate vīryendriyaṃ //
tgt_original: 若法信根所攝，是法即為進根所修，是名進根。

src_original: tatra katamat smṛtīndriyaṃ /
tgt_original: 云何念根？

src_original: yān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati tān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati /  idam ucyate smṛtīndriyam //
tgt_original: 若法進根所修，是法終不忘失，是名念根。

src_original: tatra katamat samādhīndriyaṃ /
tgt_original: 云何定根？

src_original: yān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati tān samādhīndriyeṇaikāgrīkarotīdam ucyate samādhīndriyaṃ //
tgt_original: 若法念根所攝，是法不忘不失一心不亂，是名定根。

src_original: tatra katamat prajñendriyam /
tgt_original: 云何慧根？

src_original: tatra katamā muditā /
tgt_original: 云何為喜？

src_original: yāvad dharmānusmaraṇāt prītiḥ prasādaḥ prāmodyaṃ cittasyānnavalīnatānnavamṛdyatāparitarṣaṇā /  sarvakāmaratīnām apakarṣaṇā sarvadharmaratīnāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ /  cittasya prāmodyaṃ kāyasyaudbilyaṃ buddheḥ saṃpraharṣaṇaṃ manasa utplavaḥ /
tgt_original: 常念於法歡喜踊躍，不生懈怠無諸惱熱，離五欲樂住於法樂，心和悅豫身輕柔軟，意勤勸督心常生悲，樂求如來無上法身。

src_original: tathāgatakāyābhinandanaratir lakṣaṇānuvyañjanavibhūṣaṇaparyeṣṭikauśalyaṃ /  kuśaladharmaśravaṇāparikhedatā /  tatvadharmapratiśaraṇapratipattiprītiprasādapramodyaṃ muditasya dharmotplavaḥ /
tgt_original: 樂修相好以自莊嚴，聽法無厭念行正法，行正法已心生歡喜，生歡喜已具得法悲。

src_original: satataṃ satveṣv apratihatabuddhitā /  tīvracchandatā /  buddhadharmaparyeṣṭiṣu tasya ca dharmacchandasyānnutsṛjanatā /  udāreṣu buddhadharmeṣv adhimuktiḥ /  vimuktiḥ prādeśikayānāpakṛṣṭacittotpādaḥ /  mātsaryāsaṃkucitaś cittotpādaḥ /  yācitasya dātukāmatā /  dadato dattvā ca trimaṇḍalapariśodhitaṃ dānaprāmodyaṃ /
tgt_original: 「常於眾生不生礙心，以增上欲勤求於法，勤欲法已深心得解甚深佛法，遠離二乘發無上心，除諸慳惜發於捨心，見來乞者心生歡喜，捨時歡喜施已無悔，如是布施三時清淨，得清淨已心則悅豫，於持戒者常行布施，於毀禁者喜心攝取。

src_original: śīlavatsu sadā prasādaḥ /
tgt_original: 自持禁戒心則清淨。

src_original: duḥśīleṣv anugrahaprītiḥ /
tgt_original: 能令惡道怖懼眾生得無所畏遠離惡處，一心迴向如來禁戒，堅持牢固不可虧壞，惡罵加己堪忍不報。 「於諸眾生心無憍慢，於諸尊長謙下恭敬，言常和悅離於嚬蹙。 先以愛語終無諂曲，不以邪心誘誑於人，不以利養為他執役，其心清淨無有麁過。

src_original: sarvatrānuśaṃsadarśitā ātmaskhalitapratyavekṣitā /  āpattiṣv acodanatā saṃrañjanīyadharmeṣv anuvartanatā /  śāstṛprema bodhisatveṣu /
tgt_original: 於諸不可不見其過，不求他短不舉人罪，專心正念諸和敬法，於諸菩薩生如來想。

src_original: ātmaprema dharmeṣu /  jīvitaprema tathāgateṣu /  mātāpitṛprema guruṣu /  putraprema satveṣu /  buddhaprema ācāryopādhyāyeṣu /
tgt_original: 愛說法者重於己身，愛重如來如惜己命。
